about_the_game:
Today is your first day as the town's new Post Master.

When your grandmother falls ill, you return to Hazelwood and unwittingly take over as the new Post Master at the small, dusty post office on the town square. The only problem, Hazelwood has no addresses.



In a gentle, day to day cycle, you'll open up your little post office each morning, and explore the ongoing story of the town through the letters the residents write. Identify clues, figure out who is who, and decide where to deliver each one. From the monthly newspaper route, to special deliveries between businesses of the town, to lost love letters with no signature. Over the course of a year, you'll learn all about the people who live in Hazelwood- and the neighbouring towns of Lighthouse Point and Crow Hollows too.



This cozy puzzle game is set in a beautiful hand drawn world, with a humorous heart-warming narrative.

Welcome to Hazelwood.



Features
  • A gentle puzzling pace that you can pick up and put down whenever you like
  • 3 unique towns to explore: Hazelwood, Lighthouse Point, and Crow Hollows
  • 5 charming and hand illustrated weather cycles
  • 60 in-game days to explore the town of Hazelwood
  • Meet over 200 unique NPCs across Hazelwood & the surrounding towns
  • 35 illustrated characters who visit your post office
  • Befriend the citizens, attend town events, and perhaps even fall in love.
  • Multiple correct solutions, choose where to deliver letters and affect the story

name: Tales from Hazelwood Post
short_description: When your grandmother falls ill, you return to Hazelwood and unwittingly take over as the new Post Master at the small, dusty post office on the square. The only problem, this town has no street names or addresses. In this cosy puzzle game, solve puzzles, deliver the mail, and reconnect the town.
